item.title: Mystery odour that plagued school for weeks ‘was a teacher using fart spray’
item.description: 'My son's asthma has been triggered multiple times because of this and I had to take him to the doctor three times.'

item.title: People think the rapture is coming and are sharing tips on how you can be ‘saved’
item.description: Pastor Joshua Mhlakela has warned that Jesus will return on September 23 ‘whether you are ready or not’.

item.title: Schoolchildren fall ill after eating falafel contaminated with human waste
How the ‘world’s smelliest fruit’ sparked a town centre’s gas leak emergency
item.description: An engineer tested a number of shops trying to find the source of the 'leak'

item.title: Bear attacks woman, 90, after wandering into shop during rampage in New Jersey
item.description: The bear's odd behaviour led to fears it may have been sick.
